Name: Immortal Quest
About the game: In this epic adventure, you play the role of Anna. A young lady whose destiny is to liberate her people from the strong hold of demons, who have completely over run there kingdom. In this adventure, you encounter countless of demons, destroy many bad ass bosses, explore many dungeons, explore hidden treasures and unravel the mystery behind the collapse of once impregnable kingdom and restore peace to mankind. Game Features Captivating and intriguing story line. Unlock and execute fatal combo and magic skills Defeat powerful and ruthless enemies and bosses Equip two different weapon types Captivating soundtrack and amazing soundscapes Explore your environments to discover hidden treasures Purchase more powerful weapons/armors from store, as you level up Upgrade your weapons and body armors
